content: **crocheted christmas baubles in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-802 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** circumference approx 16 cm **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 09 nutmeg 50 g colour 41 bordeaux 50 g colour 83 pearl 50 g colour 86 pink sand 50 g colour 87 pomegranate 50 g colour 88 pistachio 50 g colour 89 light sea green 50 g colour 90 moss green **accessories** wadding 1 bauble weighs approx 12 g without wadding **crochet hook ** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
